duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive art education strategies to engage students and foster creativity.
Create and implement effective lesson plans that cater to diverse student learning needs and abilities.
Guide and support students in developing their art portfolios, providing constructive feedback and mentorship.
Manage student projects, artwork presentations, and art events at a school level, ensuring a supportive and inclusive environment.
Assess student work and provide meaningful feedback to nurture artistic growth and achievement.
Coordinate the art portfolio review process, including the evaluation of student work and the selection of pieces for submission.
Individually display and present each submitted piece of art for proper evaluation, ensuring clarity and adherence to submission guidelines.
Collaborate with colleagues to support a creative and engaging art program, contributing to school-wide initiatives and events.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Art Education, Fine Arts, or related field (Master's preferred)
